Throw a trident at something.
Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

minecraft:adventure/voluntary_exile.title: Voluntary Exile
minecraft:adventure/voluntary_exile.description:
Kill a raid captain.
Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

minecraft:end/find_end_city.description: Go on in, what could happen?
